sentences.sContent: The government has just begun a multi-billion euro floodgate project aimed at stopping rising sea levels destroying the town.
sentences.sContent_eng: The government has just begun a multi-billion euro floodgate project aimed at stopping rising sea levels destroying the town.
sentences.sCn: 当地政府已拨款数十亿欧元用于投资防潮水闸工程，目的是要停止海平面上涨对水城的破坏。

synos.tran: 水闸；水门；防潮水闸；制约（怒气）

trans.tranCn: 水闸；水门；防潮水闸；制约（怒气）
trans.tranOther: a gate that is used to control the flow of water from a large lake or river
